derivation: neuter of a compound of G1722 (ἐνώπιον) and a derivative of G3700 (ἐνώπιον);
kjv_def: before, in the presence (sight) of, to
strongs_def: in the face of (literally or figuratively)
outline:
1. in the presence of, before
    1. of occupied place: in that place which is before, or over against, opposite, any one and towards which another turns his eyes
